sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - மாரிகாலத்தில் தங்கு, நிந்தி, நிந்தனை, நியமிக்கப்படு, மரணத்துக்குத் துணி
1) to reproach, to taunt, to blaspheme, to defy, to jeopardize, to rail, to upbraid
b) (Piel) to reproach, to defy, to taunt
2) (Qal) to winter, to spend harvest time, to remain in harvest time

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to pull off, that is, (by implication) to expose (as by stripping); specifically to betroth (as if a surrender); figuratively to carp at, that is, defame; denominatively (from H2779) to spend the winter: - betroth, blaspheme, defy, jeopard, rail, reproach, upbraid.
Cognate: H2741, H2756, H2778, H2779, H2780, H2781
